Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to workspace settings > Workflows. 3. Enable Add approvals. 4. Go offline. 5. Click on the existing approval workflow. 6. Click Approval. 7. Select another member and click Save. 8. Click Save again. 9. Click on the same workflow. 10. Go online. ## Expected Result: Edit approval workflow will not become blank after returning online. ## Actual Result: Edit approval workflow becomes blank after editing it offline and returning online. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Which of our officially supported platforms is this issue occurring on? - [ ] Android: Standalone - [ ] Android: HybridApp - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: Standalone - [ ] iOS: HybridApp - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/94f85700-32dd-4892-be10-2bcac5e2b7fb [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
